summary: The journals of Adrien Tenius, an Imperial in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This is the product of a play through using the mod 'Take Notes - Journal of the Dragonborn. The total number of words so far is 9534 and this will only continue to grow as the play through is on going so I will slowly be adding new books to the series.

Currently, the only way to obtain it is to use console commands - type help adrien and you should see the two books' id.

The save I used is heavily modded and references many of these mods through the duration of the texts.

To install, use NMM or drag and drop the .esp into data folder or whatever mod organiser you use.

While I consider myself literate there will be errors as while I have checked the text for spelling and grammar errors, I will have missed some. PLEASE MAKE ME AWARE OF THIS SO I CAN FIX IT! Screen cap it and send it to me as a PM So I can use it as reference.
author: Rocopherus
